attributes.action: Make school Uniform affordable for all.
attributes.additional_details: Because schools run under the government and it is your responsibility to make sure that uniform is affordable for all. Not everyone has the financial capability to be able to afford uniforms for their children, especially when you have multiple children you need to purchase for. Something needs to be done. If schools expect children to wear uniform than it should be made affordable!
attributes.background: I would like the government to look into why school uniform provided by schools is expensive. It is ridiculous that schools charge an extortionate amount for uniform they expect students to wear.

rejection.details: The Government has recently introduced a law that enables the Government to set statutory guidance on uniform costs, instructing schools to keep prices down. You can read more about how this will work here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-law-to-make-school-uniform-costs-affordable-for-all
